name: Solar Energy Benefits Report
description: A brief report about solar energy benefits
massive_request: Write a brief report about solar energy benefits

phases.name: Research Phase
phases.prompt: Research solar energy benefits: environmental, economic, and social. Find 5-10 credible sources. Save findings to research_notes.md in your workspace.

tasks.name: Web Research
tasks.description: Search for recent information about solar energy benefits (environmental, economic, social)

context.use_case: Find credible sources on solar energy

phases.name: Report Writing Phase
phases.prompt: Based on research_notes.md, write a brief HTML report about solar energy benefits. Include: executive summary, environmental benefits, economic benefits, conclusion. Save as solar_report.html.

tasks.name: Write Report
tasks.description: Generate professional HTML report from research findings

context.success_criteria: Complete HTML report with all sections

phases.name: Delivery Phase
phases.prompt: Convert solar_report.html to PDF and email to user at their registered email address.

tasks.name: Convert and Email
tasks.description: Convert report to PDF and email to user
